body:
Add version 8.0.6.0 and remove 8.0.5.30.  IBM is fairly aggressive
about removing old versions, and 8.0.5.30 is no longer available from
their download site.

----------

I looked around IBM's download site a bit, but I couldn't find an
archive directory for 8.0.5.30 or other old versions.

http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/

If someone can find where old versions are archived, then let me know
and we can set `list_url`.
title: ibm-java: add version 8.0.6.0
